title: League of legends is boring.
body:
Please Rito, make it fun again!

Also, a survery on wards and skins? Seriously? You don't think your game has bigger issues at the moment?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 


First and last Rito survey I'll ever particiapte in.

replies.body:
Why do you think it's boring ATM ? The number 1 reason your not having fun ?

Personally I just recently started playing a lot. I'm having a lot of fun playing with my pals

A lot of people who are older players end up liking a past season more than the current one.  They want the game to be more like it was and less like it is, so their memory is making the game less fun for them.

It's still a fun game by itself, but there's six years of variety behind it that are sometimes too much for people to get over.

just no, now you are assuming things work the way you think they do. go ask why previous seasons were better and you'll be overwhelmed by the amount of reasons. you're just going to shrug them off and say "lol no ur reasons are wrong ure just thinking it was better hehe xd"?

I'm not assuming, I'm stating my opinion based on my own experiences.  I've played this game since season 1 and I've seen many friends come and go for a number of reasons.

I haven't said that anyone is right or wrong, or that the game was or was not more fun in the past.  I didn't even say that I'm speaking for a majority here.  All I said is it's currently still a fun game, and many players don't think it's currently fun because of how it used to be.  Perhaps you should stop making assumptions and just take my words at face value.

Bigger issues? like what? OP champs? servers?
And how will a survey about a bigger issue make the game fun again? 

unrelated?
I've been feeling the exact same way recently not sure why. I love this game.

Perhaps you crave some variety try different mobas for a game or two, or even different genres altogether! 

Playing league evey single day would def get boring lol. But it's fun for me ATM
